properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: JWT secret key used for signing tokens

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration-ms
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: List of allowed origins for CORS

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: List of allowed HTTP methods for CORS

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: List of allowed headers for CORS

properties.name: app.cors.exposed-headers
properties.description: List of exposed headers for CORS

properties.name: app.cors.allow-credentials
properties.description: Whether credentials are supported for CORS
